properties.name: Terms
properties.title: Terms
properties.defaultValue:
• Quotation acceptance is subject to and in accordance with William Adams Pty Ltd.s standard Rental Terms that are available.        

    https://www.williamadams.com.au/terms-            and-conditions/

  • If the Customer has entered into a separate written agreement signed by an authorised representative of the Company, the terms of that separate agreement will apply to this quotation.
  • All quoted rates are exclusive of GST.
  • Hire rates subject to availability at time of order.
  • Renter protection cover is charged at 12% of hire rates if applicable.
  • Earthmoving equipment (excluding Mini Excavators, Skid Steer Loaders & Rollers) hire rates include a daily allowance of up to 8 hours and a weekly allowance of up to 40 Hours usage averaged over the hire term.
  • Excess hour charges for usage beyond this allowance are charged at 1/8th of the daily rate and 1/40th of the weekly rate per excess hour.
  • General plant and equipment rates are based on single shift operation unless otherwise specified.
  • Hirer is responsible for the supply and replacement of ground engaging tools during the hire period

properties.name: SpConditions
properties.placeholder: Type in any special conditions if applicable

properties.name: richtext_label_19
properties.text: Signed for and on behalf of the Renter by its duly authorised signatories accepting this quotation
properties.textTranslation: Signed for and on behalf of the Renter by its duly authorised signatories accepting this quotation

properties.name: richtext_label_21
properties.text: Please select the manager/supervisor that needs to approve this Quote Form. The person you specify will have the option of adding additional approvers to the approval chain.
properties.textTranslation: Please select the manager/supervisor that needs to approve this Quote Form. The person you specify will have the option of adding additional approvers to the approval chain.
